head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths STARK, CECELIA SHIER

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths STARK, CECELIA SHIER

block.p: STARK-Cecelia Shier. Age 89, on November 5, 2001, in Boca Raton, Florida. Born November 28, 1911. Beloved wife of the late Wilfred, devoted mother of Emily Danson, and the late Winifred Stark, cherished grandmother of Christopher and Melissa Danson, dear sister of Esther Stein, Dr. Julius M. Shier, and the late Helen Provisor. Gone from our sight, forever in our hearts.
